machine_extruder_start_code.default_value:
;start T0

M117 changing tool....
M109 T0 S{material_print_temperature}

G1 E6 F600; prime
G1 E4 F1200
G92 E0
G1 Y-65 F9000; wipe

M117 printing...

machine_extruder_end_code.default_value:
M104 T0 S{material_standby_temperature}
G1 X50 Y0 F9000 ; go to wipe position
G1 X0 Y-100 F9000; wipe
G1 X-72 F9000
G1 E3 F600; prime
G1 E1 F1200
G92 E0

;end T0
